description: Factory with implementation address in CREATE2 salt for version-specific account addresses
changes: Modified _computeSalt() to include implementation address in CREATE2 salt
Different contract versions now get different account addresses
Allows reusing same salt (index 0) during development when contract code changes
Account address is independent of passkey (qx, qy) and 2FA settings
notes: This deployment uses a different factory address than previous deployments
The salt calculation now includes the implementation address
This is NOT a vanity address deployment (no 0x000000 prefix)
Frontend .env files updated with new factory address
Note: Foundry's CREATE2 deployment doesn't produce the expected vanity address
The salt 0x1eb54b512d3bb151834ddb91521c2344e3b598a3facafb4d2c2b633c93e628c1 was verified to produce 0x00000038f2A972e308AaB153c84e6ed3e38e8225 with raw CREATE2
But Foundry's deployment mechanism produced 0x21939287E8b2bA5cfFBF103C1369Ec6Cf8f35AbF instead
